oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Garrett's Snuff Variety Show #322 - 1942-03-26
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Garrett's Snuff sponsored Variety show, program numbers 322 and 323, featuring Happy Hal Burns (performer) and the Variety Gang (performers), Kid Clark (performer), the Love Brothers (performers), Lonnie Love (performer) and comedy skits performed by the cast. Broadcast on March 26, 1942 and March 27, 1942, respectively.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Happy Hal Burns; Lonnie Love; Love Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Opening theme -- Opening statement -- Happy Hal Burns introduces the first tune -- The Fire Song (Rock Of Ages Cleft For Me) (Happy Hal Burns and the Variety Gang) -- Garrett's Snuff commercial -- It Makes No Never Mind (Lonnie Love) -- Comedy skit (cast) -- Burns introduces the next tune -- We Buried Her Beneath The Willow (Love Brothers) -- Garrett's Snuff commercial -- He Leadeth Me (Happy Hal Burns) -- Closing memory thought -- Closing theme -- Closing statement -- [break] -- Opening theme -- Opening statement -- Wait Till The Cloud Roll By, Jenny (Happy Hal Burns and the Variety Gang) -- Garrett's Snuff commercial -- Hal Burns introduces the next tune -- Honolulu Bundle (Jackie ukulele) -- Comedy skit (cast) -- Hal Burns introduces the next tune -- Weary, Worried, And Blue (Lonnie Love) -- Beautiful Beckoning Hands (Hal Burns and the Variety Gang) -- Closing memory thought -- Closing theme -- Closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Garrett's Snuff and Dental Snuff Variety Program (Radio program); Burns, Hal; Love, Lonnie;
